Package space.sunqian.common.base.string

package space.sunqian.common.base.string
Provides utilities and interfaces for string related.

Utilities:

  • StringKit
Interfaces:
  • StringView
  • NameFormatter
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    space.sunqian.common.base
    This package is the base package for this lib, provides basic supports.
  • Class
    Description
    NameFormatException
    Extension for naming format, typically used for NameFormatter.
    NameFormatter
    Name formatter, used to parse or format a given name.
    NameFormatter.Appender
    Appender for appending each word split by NameFormatter.tokenize(CharSequence) into the specified Appendable.
    StringKit
    Utilities kit for string related.
    StringView
    StringRef is a view over one or more CharSequence instances, it provides a unified interface to access character sequences that may be composed of multiple underlying sources.
